name: LegacyRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: legacy radio
des:
Legacy Radio is your premier destination for the soulful rhythms of R&B from the iconic 
decades of the 60s, 70s, and 80s.
 
 From the Motown classics that ignited the 60s to the funk and disco anthems of the 70s, and the soulful ballads of the 80s. Our playlist is a tribute to the legendary artists who paved the way, from Aretha Franklin to Marvin Gaye, and Stevie Wonder to Earth, Wind & Fire.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
